original_text: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:
korean_text: 물에 자기 누각의 들보를 얹으시며 구름으로 자기 수레를 삼으시고 바람 날개로 다니시며

sentences.original_text: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자신의 처마 들보를 물에 두시며

sentences.original_text: who maketh the clouds his chariot
who walketh upon the wings of the wind
